params._lendingPoolParams: The parameters for the lending pool

returns._0: Address of the newly created lending pool router
Address of the DEX router contract
Address of the interest rate model contract
The minimum amount of liquidity required to supply
True if the address is an operator

params._eid: The LayerZero endpoint ID corresponding to the chain

params._interestRateModel: Address of the interest rate model

params._status: True to grant operator status, false to revoke

params._tokenDataStream: Address of the token data stream contract

params._wrappedNative: Address of the wrapped native token

returns._0: Address of the shares token deployer
Address of the Supala emitter contract
Address of the token data stream
Address of the wrapped native token contract

chainIdToEid(uint256).notice: Converts a chain ID to LayerZero endpoint ID

creatorFee(address).notice: Returns the creator fee for a lending pool router

dexRouter().notice: Returns the address of the DEX router

interestRateModel().notice: Returns the address of the interest rate model

isHealthy().notice: Returns the address of the health check contract

minAmountSupplyLiquidity(address).notice: Returns the minimum amount of liquidity required to supply

oftAddress(address).notice: Returns the OFT (Omnichain Fungible Token) address for a token

operator(address).notice: Checks if an address is an authorized operator

owner().notice: Returns the owner address of the factory

positionDeployer().notice: Returns the address of the position deployer contract

proxyDeployer().notice: Returns the address of the proxy deployer contract

setChainIdToEid(uint256,uint32).notice: Sets the LayerZero endpoint ID for a specific chain ID

setDexRouter(address).notice: Sets the DEX router contract address

setInterestRateModel(address).notice: Sets the interest rate model contract address

setMinAmountSupplyLiquidity(address,uint.notice: Sets the minimum amount required to supply liquidity for a token

setOftAddress(address,address).notice: Sets the OFT address for a token

setOperator(address,bool).notice: Sets operator status for an address

setPositionDeployer(address).notice: Sets the position deployer contract address

setTokenDataStream(address).notice: Sets the token data stream contract address

setWrappedNative(address).notice: Sets the wrapped native token contract address

sharesTokenDeployer().notice: Returns the address of the shares token deployer contract

supalaEmitter().notice: Returns the address of the Supala emitter contract

tokenDataStream().notice: Returns the address of the token data stream contract

wrappedNative().notice: Returns the address of the wrapped native token
